item.title: 美国债券市场对贝森特的 10 年期收益率承诺反应冷淡
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）承诺控制10年期国债收益率，但周四债券市场上出现了一些怀疑的声音，因为通胀压力和联邦赤字扩大的预期有可能超过抑制借贷成本的努力。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent's pledge to contain yields on 10-year Treasury notes met some skepticism in the bond market on Thursday, as inflationary pressures and expectations of a widening federal deficit threaten to outweigh efforts to curb borrowing costs.】

item.title: 高管称，尽管特朗普提出了计划，美国二叠纪盆地的石油产量增长仍将在 2025 年放缓
item.description: 能源高管周四预测，尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言最大限度地提高产量，但美国产量最高的二叠纪盆地今年的石油产量增长预计将放缓至少25%。【原文：Growth in oil output from the U.S. Permian basin, the country's most prolific formation, is expected to slow by at least 25% this year despite President Donald Trump's vow to maximize production, energy executives forecast on Thursday.】

item.title: 波士顿联储为特朗普贸易关税制定通胀对策
item.description: 波士顿联邦储备银行周四发布的一份报告称，特朗普政府寻求的全套关税措施将给本已处于高位的通胀带来明显的上行压力。【原文：The full suite of tariffs sought by the Trump administration would have created notable upward pressure for already high levels of inflation, a report by the Federal Reserve Bank of Boston released on Thursday said.】

item.title: 美国顶级资产管理公司因中国基金问题面临共和党各州检察长的审查
item.description: 由 17 位共和党州总检察长组成的小组声称，包括贝莱德（BlackRock）和道富（State Street）在内的美国顶级资产管理公司对其在中国的投资进行了不当或不充分的披露。【原文：A group of 17 Republican state attorneys general alleged that top U.S. asset managers, including BlackRock and State Street , were making improper or inadequate disclosures about their investments in China.】

item.title: 保时捷称汽车研发费用将影响 2025 年营业利润
item.description: 保时捷股份公司（Porsche AG）周四表示，其子公司的汽车开发和电池业务支出将在 2025 年对其营业利润和汽车净现金流产生高达 8 亿欧元（8.308 亿美元）的影响。【原文：Porsche AG said on Thursday that expenses for the vehicle development and battery activities in its subsidiaries will impact its operating profit and automotive net cash flow for up to 800 million euros ($830.80 million) in 2025.】

item.title: 巴西 Galipolo 发现加密货币使用量激增，称 90% 的流量与稳定币有关
item.description: 巴西央行行长加布里埃尔-加里波洛（Gabriel Galipolo）周四表示，过去两三年来，巴西的加密资产使用量激增，其中约 90% 的流量与稳定币有关。【原文：Brazil's central bank chief Gabriel Galipolo said on Thursday that crypto asset usage in the country has surged over the past two to three years, with around 90% of the flow linked to stablecoins.】

item.title: 管理者和倡导者称，用于美国项目的数十亿美元资金仍被特朗普冻结
item.description: 路透社的一项分析发现，唐纳德-特朗普总统已经搁置了国会批准的数百亿美元的项目支出，这些项目包括从爱荷华州大豆种植者采用更环保的做法到弗吉尼亚州铁路扩建等。【原文：President Donald Trump has placed holds on tens of billions of dollars in congressionally-approved spending for projects across the U.S. that range from Iowa soybean farmers adopting greener practices to a Virginia railway expansion, a Reuters analysis found.】

item.title: 贝森特关注 10 年期美国国债收益率可能会让美联储放松警惕
item.description: 特朗普政府开始关注长期国债收益率，这可能表明其对可能阻碍唐纳德-特朗普总统经济计划的市场制约因素越来越敏感，同时也让美联储摆脱了他的直接控制。【原文：The Trump administration's emerging focus on long-term Treasury bond yields may show growing sensitivity to market constraints that could impede President Donald Trump's economic plans, while also getting the Federal Reserve out of his direct line of fire.】

item.title: 古尔斯比美联储为最终减息做好了充分准备，尽管不确定性意味着要放慢脚步
item.description: 芝加哥联储主席奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周四表示，一个充分就业、增长稳健且通胀率下降的经济将使美国联邦储备委员会（Federal Reserve）得以继续降息，尽管关税和其他政策变化的影响存在不确定性，但仍需要放慢步伐。【原文：A full-employment economy with solid growth and falling inflation will let the U.S. Federal Reserve continue cutting interest rates, though uncertainty about the impact of tariffs and other policy changes argues for a slower approach, Chicago Fed President Austan Goolsbee said on Thursday.】

item.title: 研究称，澳大利亚公司因高管薪酬接近创纪录水平而面临投资者的愤怒
item.description: 股东顾问公司 Georgeson 的一项研究显示，2024 年，因薪酬计划而面临投资者反对的澳大利亚公司数量连续第二年接近历史最高水平。【原文：The number of Australian companies facing investor opposition over remuneration plans held near record levels for a second straight year in 2024, according to a study by shareholder advisor Georgeson.】

item.title: OpenAI 表示德克萨斯州的数据中心将成为星际之门项目的 "旗舰"。
item.description: 聊天软件制造商 OpenAI 周四表示，德克萨斯州将成为其与软银合作建设的星际之门项目中的 "旗舰 "数据中心所在地。【原文：ChatGPT maker OpenAI said on Thursday that Texas will be the "flagship" data center site in the Stargate project it is building with SoftBank .】

item.title: 美国和巴拿马总统计划在运河争端中举行会谈
item.description: 巴拿马总统何塞-劳尔-穆利诺（Jose Raul Mulino）周四在社交媒体上表示，他将于周五下午3:30与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）通话，巴拿马运河问题上的对峙日趋紧张。【原文：Panamanian President Jose Raul Mulino said on social media on Thursday that he would speak to his U.S. counterpart Donald Trump at 3:30pm on Friday afternoon, amid an increasingly tense standoff over the Panama Canal.】

item.title: 特朗普传媒申请针对比特币和美国产业的投资产品商标
item.description: 特朗普媒体和技术集团（Trump Media and Technology Group）周四表示，它已经申请了六种追踪比特币和美国制造业及能源行业的投资产品的商标。【原文：Trump Media and Technology Group said on Thursday it has applied to trademark six investment products that track bitcoin and the U.S. manufacturing and energy sectors.】

item.title: 美国炼油商迪莱克首席执行官表示，如果关税生效，将增加轻质甜油的产量
item.description: 美国炼油商迪莱克公司首席执行官阿维加尔-索莱克（Avigal Soreq）周四表示，在来自加拿大和墨西哥的重质酸性原油供应受到关税不确定性威胁的情况下，如果这样做经济实惠，迪莱克公司可以选择生产更多的轻质甜原油。【原文：U.S. refiner Delek has the option to run more light, sweet crude oil if it is economical to do so, CEO Avigal Soreq said on Thursday, amid tariff uncertainty threatening supplies of heavy sour grades from Canada and Mexico.】

item.title: 欧莱雅第四季度销售额增长 2.5%，不及预期
item.description: 法国化妆品集团欧莱雅（L'Oreal）周四公布第四季度销售额增长 2.5%，但低于预期，原因是中国市场需求持续疲软，北美市场增长放缓。【原文：French cosmetics group L'Oreal reported a 2.5% rise in fourth-quarter sales on Thursday, missing expectations due to persistently weak demand in China and a slowdown in growth in North America.】

item.title: 特朗普因中国对药品征收关税面临来自美国工业界的压力
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正面临着来自美国医院和仿制药制造商的压力，他们要求特朗普在对中国进口商品征收的新关税中豁免医疗产品，因为他们和大型制药公司的游说者一样，都表示这种贸易壁垒将导致美国药品短缺和价格上涨。【原文：President Donald Trump is facing pressure from U.S. hospitals and generic drugmakers to exempt medical goods from his new tariffs on Chinese imports, as they join big pharma lobbyists who have said such trade barriers will cause shortages of medicines and higher prices in the United States.】

item.title: 中国争端被视为特朗普对世贸组织立场的早期考验
item.description: 贸易消息人士周四称，中国与美国的新贸易争端可能会考验华盛顿对世界贸易组织的承诺，而世界贸易组织迄今为止一直没有受到批评多边机构的唐纳德-特朗普总统的审查。【原文：China's new trade dispute with the U.S. could test Washington's commitment to the World Trade Organization, which has so far escaped the scrutiny of President Donald Trump, a critic of multilateral institutions, trade sources said on Thursday.】

item.title: 据 ABC 新闻报道，特朗普将会见美国钢铁公司和联邦快递首席执行官
item.description: 美国广播公司新闻（ABC News）援引消息人士的话报道称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普将于周四会见美国钢铁公司和联邦快递公司的领导人。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump will meet with leaders of U.S. Steel and FedEx on Thursday, ABC News reported, citing sources.】

item.title: Equifax 公布第四季度收入低于预期，原因是招聘速度放缓，股价下跌
item.description: 信用评级公司 Equifax 第四季度营收低于预期，受雇佣市场疲软和利率持续走高导致抵押贷款增长慢于预期的影响，周四股价下跌超过 6.5%。【原文：Credit ratings firm Equifax's fourth-quarter revenue fell short of estimates, hurt by a weaker hiring market and slower-than-expected mortgage growth as interest rates remain elevated, sending shares down over 6.5% on Thursday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称评估美国削减对外援助和关税的影响为时尚早
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周四表示，它正在密切关注美国的事态发展，包括特朗普政府停止对外援助和对中国征收关税的举措，但要对其影响作出明确评估还为时过早。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Thursday said it is closely following developments in the U.S., including moves by the Trump administration to halt foreign aid and impose tariffs on China, but it was too soon to offer clear assessments of the impact.】

item.title: 南加州爱迪生公司正在调查与洛杉矶大火可能存在的联系
item.description: 爱迪生国际公司（Edison International）的子公司南加州爱迪生公司（SCE）周四表示，该公司正在调查其设备是否与今年洛杉矶地区两场野火的点燃有关。【原文：Southern California Edison (SCE), a subsidiary of Edison International , said on Thursday that it was probing whether its equipment was associated with the ignition of two Los Angeles-area wildfires this year.】

item.title: 报告称今年清洁能源成本将继续下降
item.description: 彭博全球环境基金（BloombergNEF）周四发布的一份报告显示，尽管以绿色能源进口关税为形式的保护主义抬头，但全球风能、太阳能和电池储能等清洁能源技术的成本今年有望进一步下降。【原文：The cost of clean energy technologies worldwide, such as wind, solar and battery storage, are expected to fall further this year, a report by BloombergNEF showed on Thursday, despite rising protectionism in the form of tariffs on green energy imports.】

item.title: 法国初创公司 Mistral 在不断升级的人工智能竞赛中推出应用程序
item.description: 由英伟达（Nvidia）支持的法国初创公司Mistral AI周四为其生成式人工智能软件推出了一款新的应用程序，紧接着中国的DeepSeek公司在上个月推出了一款新的人工智能助手。【原文：Nvidia-backed French startup Mistral AI rolled out a new app for its generative AI software on Thursday, hot on the heels of last month's launch of a new AI assistant by China's DeepSeek.】

item.title: Spotify 与华纳音乐集团签署新的多年发行协议
item.description: Spotify 和华纳音乐集团（旗下拥有 Ed Sheeran 和 Dua Lipa 等艺人的唱片公司）周四表示，双方签署了一项新的多年期音乐录制和出版协议。【原文：Spotify and Warner Music Group , which owns labels behind artists such as Ed Sheeran and Dua Lipa, signed a new multi-year deal for recording and publishing music, the companies said on Thursday.】

item.title: 由于需求稳定，Pop-Tarts 制造商 Kellanova 的季度销售额和利润均超出预期
item.description: 由于对 Pringles 和 Cheez-It 等零食和早餐谷物的需求稳定，包装食品公司 Kellanova 周四公布的第四季度盈利超出华尔街预期。【原文：Packaged food company Kellanova beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter earnings on Thursday, on the back of steady demand for its snacks and breakfast cereals such as Pringles and Cheez-It.】

item.title: 打车平台 Lyft 与 Anthropic 合作，提供人工智能客户服务
item.description: Lyft 周四表示，它已与亚马逊和 Alphabet 支持的初创公司 Anthropic 合作，为该打车平台的客户服务业务推出人工智能工具。【原文：Lyft said on Thursday it has tied up with Amazon and Alphabet-backed startup Anthropic to roll out artificial intelligence tools for the ride-hailing platform's customer care operations.】

item.title: 亨廷顿英格尔斯公司公布第四季度盈利低于预期，股价下滑
item.description: 受纽波特纽斯（Newport News）造船厂业绩下滑的影响，军工造船企业亨廷顿英格尔斯（Huntington Ingalls）周四未能达到预期的第四季度收入和利润，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了 11%。【原文：Military Shipbuilder Huntington Ingalls missed estimates for fourth-quarter revenue and profit on Thursday, hurt by lower performance at its Newport News shipbuilding facility, sending its shares down 11% in pre-market trading.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数小幅上升
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数量略有增加，这与劳动力市场逐渐宽松的状况相一致。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased moderately last week, consistent with gradually easing labor market conditions.】

item.title: Zimmer Biomet 预测 2025 年利润低于预期
item.description: 医疗器械生产商 Zimmer Biomet Holdings 周四预测全年调整后利润低于华尔街预期，因为该公司预计美元走强将对其造成冲击。【原文：Medical device maker Zimmer Biomet Holdings forecast full-year adjusted profit below Wall Street estimates on Thursday, as it anticipates a hit from a strong dollar.】

item.title: 为什么特朗普废除贸易漏洞会使低收入和少数族裔美国人陷入困境？
item.description: 美国人在中国直购网站上购买 5 美元的衬衫、10 美元的灯具和 20 美元的鞋子，价格会上涨。【原文：Prices will rise for Americans who buy $5 shirts, $10 lamps and $20 shoes on direct-from-China shopping sites.】
